rows.label: qev051003_MSG0001
rows.name: Ngh...hnnngh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0002
rows.name: Nrrrgh?! ...Oh. It's you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0003
rows.name: Heh. You have found me in quite a state.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0004
rows.name:
I took the completed unbreakable sword into the field
to hunt indigens, but the Ganglion turned up while I
was fighting my quarry.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0005
rows.name:
Numbers are a cruel thing. Even the skills of a genius
are for naught against so many assailants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev051003_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask De Zing if they shattered his unbreakable sword.

rows.label: qev051003_JNK0020
rows.name: Demand

rows.label: qev051003_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist that De Zing pays what he owes you.

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0006
rows.name:
No matter how much armor it split or how many
bullets it deflected, the blade remained utterly pristine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0007
rows.name: It is every bit the perfect sword I dreamed it would be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0015
rows.name:
Indeed, I came here with sword in hand for the very
purpose of earning the funds to pay you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0008
rows.name:
The indigens I hunted along the way dropped some
valuable items that will fetch a fine price.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0009
rows.name:
...But now that I think back on my 40 years as a
swordsmith, it strikes me that I have spent precious
little time actually WIELDING a sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0010
rows.name:
Such is the price of genius, I suppose. For even under
the tyranny of the Ganglion, I was never sent to fight.
Instead, I manned the forge the entire time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0011
rows.name:
Small wonder I would be no match for a fearsome
beast like that millepod, eh? The blackguard caught
me off guard and swallowed my sword whole...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0013
rows.name:
I imagine you can already guess what I am about to
ask of you, hmm?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051003_MSG0014
rows.name:
Then off you go! Track that millepod down and wrest
my unbreakable blade from its gullet![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0068
rows.name:
The millepod that attacked me slunk off somewhere
after making a meal of my unbreakable sword.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0069
rows.name:
Tarry not! Defeat the beast and retrieve the blade of
legend from its belly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0070
rows.name:
I heard the heartrending wails of a millepod.
Did you slay the vile creature?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0071
rows.name:
Ah, yes! That is indeed my masterwork! Even the acids
of that beast's stomach could not dull its edge![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0072
rows.name:
I am dearly relieved to be reunited with it.
Seeing it now, I'm awestruck anew at its magnificence.
A given, coming from my forge, but impressive still![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0073
rows.name:
You have done so much for me, my friend.
Even I would feel remiss if I did not make some token
show of thanks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0074
rows.name: Would you accept this blade instead of currency?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0075
rows.name:
I am satisfied merely to have brought it into existence.
It is only fitting that it be wielded by a warrior of your
exceptional caliber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0076
rows.name:
Also, you could go start some new legends with it,
which would be awesome. ...So? What do you say?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0070
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0071
rows.name: Claim the unbreakable sword as your prize.

rows.label: qev051001_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev051001_SEL0081
rows.name: Say that De Zing should keep the sword.

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0077
rows.name:
My masterpiece is yours, [ST:playername ].
Ha HA! Just be sure to thank me in your heart of
hearts each time you draw it in battle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0078
rows.name:
But my dreams are far from over...
What new legend in swordmaking should I craft next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0079
rows.name:
What?! Then you feel it is my duty as the blade's
maker to become a warrior worthy of it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0080
rows.name: It does make a certain poetic sense...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0081
rows.name:
Very well! I shall set about to training with the
unbreakable blade on my hip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0082
rows.name:
I may be a touch past my prime, but I am a genius.
I will be a master of the sword soon enough![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev051001_MSG0083
rows.name:
Many thanks. You have revealed a new path to me,
[ST:playername ]. I will take to it with
everything I have![ST:wait ]
